extension.summary: EmuELEC addon. Provides binary, cores and basic settings to launch it
extension.description: EmuELEC addon is based on ToKe79 Retroarch/Lakka addon. Provides binary, cores and basic settings to launch EmuELEC.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unofficial add-on. Please don't ask for support in CoreELEC,Lakka or ToKe79 github, forums or irc channels.
